Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: 'Okay, everybody, time to go! Today, we are going to—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Children', 3: 'Virtual Center! Virtual Center!...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: "Alright, alright. Who leaked the information...? It's Virtual Center!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Children', 3: 'Oh yeah!!'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I don't want to play those boys' games. There should be something else, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: "Hmm... It takes about 10 minutes to drive from the Education Center to the city. Don't fall asleep!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So many people here... Let me find an empty corner first.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Excited Voice', 3: '...Look! It\'s the latest "Avengers 2"! I wanna play it!'}
{2: 'Arrogant Voice', 3: 'No no! Of course this one is better! "Mailman Simulator"!'}
{2: 'Excited Voice', 3: "Huh—? How can you actually like this kind of stuff? I was wrong about you. We don't have the same taste after all!"}
{2: 'Arrogant Voice', 3: '...I never said I had the same taste as you. This is a real masterpiece. Do you even understand art?'}
{2: 'Excited Voice', 3: "Art? Art is all about being cool! The popularity is what really matters. You're just playing a game, nothing more! Are you out of your mind?"}
{2: 'Arrogant Voice', 3: "I-I don't want to waste time arguing with you!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Game? Art? They're not the same thing at all. How upsetting.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: 'Ayla? Why are you here alone?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, ma'am, there are too many people around. I wanted to take a break.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "You haven't found anything that interests you, have you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'Many came here for the virtual games, but there are other hidden gems around.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'A few years ago, when I last came, I watched a virtual theater play.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Theater play? Do those still exist?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'It was done in a very interesting way. I remember it was a story about Emperor Nero.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I know! One of the books you brought me mentioned him. Emperor Nero loved arts!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'Wow, you even know that... Virtual reality can be used in a lot more places, not just games.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'So, what do you think? Do you want to continue exploring these hidden gems?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I got it! Thanks, ma'am!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "Sure. Just don't get lost, okay?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hidden gems, huh... I saw virtual aircraft piloting, virtual science experiments... But none of them is what I wanted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sarcastic Voice', 3: "...Hey, what's wrong with that one? There's no one there at all."}
{2: 'Complaining Voice', 3: "I just took a glance. It was a super boring and old-fashioned story-telling machine. Who's gonna listen to those stories nowadays?"}
{2: 'Complaining Voice', 3: 'We should go. I want to find those exciting virtual weapons!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Wait, a story-telling machine?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Is this the one...? Tempest: Prince & Maiden...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Is this Selena the author? Looks quite interesting. Anyway, let me try it first!', 4: '1'}
{3: '... (Electronic sounds)'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: '—Welcome, to this fantastic and beautiful world, but at the same time, twisted and filthy—'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'The story took place in a brilliant era.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'There was a peaceful and prosperous kingdom. Like in a fairy tale, people lived in harmony with ample resources.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'The king promised his people that all persons living on the land were equal, and had the right to pursue a good life.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'Deeply believing in his promises, the people cheered for their king all the time.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'But they seemed to forget that the wise king had an inglorious past.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'It all started two years ago, on a lonely island—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1004.jpg'}
{2: 'Ferdinand', 3: 'Ah, what a desolate place this is? I, the proudest son of the King of Naples, find myself upon this foreign field!'}
{2: 'Ferdinand', 3: 'That damned and sudden tempest, frightening to behold, overturned a mighty galleon thirty decks in height!'}
{2: 'Ferdinand', 3: "It uprooted the stout mast and shredded a hundred sturdy sails. I don't even know if my brilliant father, the blessed King of Naples, is still alive!"}
{2: 'Ferdinand', 3: 'What sin has been committed for beloved father and son to be so cruelly torn apart?'}
{2: 'Servant 1', 3: 'Your Majesty, I am sure your father will be safe.'}
{2: 'Servant 2', 3: 'Majesty, I fear the King has been shipwrecked on another island just as we have.'}
{2: 'Ferdinand', 3: 'Then what are we waiting for? Naples cannot last one day without its King, nor can I last one day without my beloved father!'}
{2: 'Ferdinand', 3: 'Pass me my sword! No treacherous wood nor wild beast can stand in my way!'}
{2: 'Servants', 3: 'Yes, Your Majesty. We will lay down our lives for you!'}
